title: post itt and i'll tell you why i don't like you (HARDCORE VERSION)
body:
lati turned his thread into a roast thread so pardon the inaccurate title (THAT I CAN'T CHANGE BECAUSE THIS PLATFORM IS A PIECE OF SHIT)

here's how this is going to work:

* opt-in by posting in this thread

post literally anything idc

* based on who you are, i will either give you a lengthy summary of what i find unappealing about you or you will be put on "the list"

* the list is a group of people who either: 

a) don't have any outstanding negative behavior that i can give my thoughts on
b) don't post often enough for me to give anything on or 
c) for personal reasons, i don't feel comfortable talking about on boards. feel free to contact me elsewhere if you end up on the list in this category 

if you notice that i haven't replied to you, check the list for your name.

do not post in this thread if:

1) you typically crumble when people talk bad about you (i'll leave this to your best judgment)
2) you're going to send me a salty dm after i give what's obviously my opinion on you
